product_name: Teva Psyclone 2 Print Sandals - Toddler Girls'
long_description: The Teva Psyclone 2 Print Sandals feature quality materials that offer grip in slippery environments and all-day comfort so your little one can play in the water just like the big girls. Neoprene and synthetic uppers repel water; soft mesh lining lets feet breathe. Open-toe construction does not allow water to pool and increases dry time. Nonmarking Durabrasion Rubber(TM) outsoles provide durable traction. Microban zinc-based antimicrobial protection fights odor. Compression molded EVA topsole provides total comfort. Teva Psyclone 2 Print Sandals have encapsulated Shoc Pads(TM) in the heels to absorb shock.
short_description: The Teva Psyclone 2 Print Sandals feature quality materials that offer grip in slippery environments and all-day comfort so your little one can play in the water just like the big girls.
